items.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes three melee attacks: two with its battleaxe and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

items.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, or 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage if used with two hands.
